verses.arabic: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَهُ ٱلْحَمْدُ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْحَكِيمُ ٱلْخَبِيرُ
verses.english: [All] praise is [due] to Allah, to whom belongs whatever is in the heavens and whatever is in the earth, and to Him belongs [all] praise in the Hereafter. And He is the Wise, the Acquainted.
verses.hausa: Gõdiya ta tabbata ga Allah, wanda Yake abin da yake a cikin sammai da abin da yake a cikin ƙasã Nãsa ne, kuma shĩ ne Mai hikima, Mai labartawa.

verses.arabic: يَعْلَمُ مَا يَلِجُ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا يَخْرُجُ مِنْهَا وَمَا يَنزِلُ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَمَا يَعْرُجُ فِيهَا ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلرَّحِيمُ ٱلْغَفُورُ
verses.english: He knows what penetrates into the earth and what emerges from it and what descends from the heaven and what ascends therein. And He is the Merciful, the Forgiving.
verses.hausa: Yã san abin da yake shiga a cikin ƙasã da abin da yake fita daga gare ta, da abin da yake sauka daga sama da abin da yake hawa a cikinta, kuma Shĩ ne Mai jin ƙai, Mai gãfara.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَا تَأْتِينَا ٱلسَّاعَةُ ۖ قُلْ بَلَىٰ وَرَبِّى لَتَأْتِيَنَّكُمْ عَـٰلِمِ ٱلْغَيْبِ ۖ لَا يَعْزُبُ عَنْهُ مِثْقَالُ ذَرَّةٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَآ أَصْغَرُ مِن ذَٰلِكَ وَلَآ أَكْبَرُ إِلَّا فِى كِتَـٰبٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: But those who disbelieve say, "The Hour will not come to us." Say, "Yes, by my Lord, it will surely come to you. [Allah is] the Knower of the unseen." Not absent from Him is an atom's weight within the heavens or within the earth or [what is] smaller than that or greater, except that it is in a clear register -
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce: "Sã'a bã zã ta zo mana ba." Ka ce: "Kayya! Na rantse da Ubangijĩna, lalle, zã ta zõ muku." Masanin gaibi, gwargwadon zarra bã ta nĩsanta daga gare Shi a cikin sammai kuma bã ta nĩsanta a cikin ƙasã, kuma bãbu mafi ƙaranci daga wancan kuma bãbu mafi girma fãce yanã a cikin Littãfi bayyananne.

verses.arabic: لِّيَجْزِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُم مَّغْفِرَةٌ وَرِزْقٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.english: That He may reward those who believe and do righteous deeds. Those will have forgiveness and noble provision.
verses.hausa: Dõmin Ya sãkã wa waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai. Waɗancan suna da wata gãfara da wani arziki mai karimci.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ سَعَوْ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مُعَـٰجِزِينَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ مِّن رِّجْزٍ أَلِيمٌ
verses.english: But those who strive against Our verses [seeking] to cause failure - for them will be a painful punishment of foul nature.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka yi mãkirci ga ãyõyinMu, sunã mãsu gajiyarwa, waɗannan sunã da wata azãba daga azãba mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: وَيَرَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمَ ٱلَّذِىٓ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ مِن رَّبِّكَ هُوَ ٱلْحَقَّ وَيَهْدِىٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلْعَزِيزِ ٱلْحَمِيدِ
verses.english: And those who have been given knowledge see that what is revealed to you from your Lord is the truth, and it guides to the path of the Exalted in Might, the Praiseworthy.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda aka bai wa ilmi sunã ganin abin nan da aka saukar zuwa gare ka daga Ubangijinka, shi ne gaskiya, kuma yanã shiryarwa zuwa ga hanyar Mabuwãyi, Gõdadde.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ هَلْ نَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ رَجُلٍ يُنَبِّئُكُمْ إِذَا مُزِّقْتُمْ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ إِنَّكُمْ لَفِى خَلْقٍ جَدِيدٍ
verses.english: But those who disbelieve say, "Shall we direct you to a man who will inform you [that] when you have disintegrated in complete disintegration, you will [then] be [recreated] in a new creation?
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce: "Shin zã mu nũna muku wani namiji wanda yake gaya muku wai idan an tsattsãge ku, kõwace irin tsattsãgẽwa, lalle kũ, tabbas, kunã a cikin wata halitta sãbuwa.?"

verses.arabic: أَفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَم بِهِۦ جِنَّةٌۢ ۗ بَلِ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ وَٱلضَّلَـٰلِ ٱلْبَعِيدِ
verses.english: Has he invented about Allah a lie or is there in him madness?" Rather, they who do not believe in the Hereafter will be in the punishment and [are in] extreme error.
verses.hausa: "Ya ƙãga ƙarya ga Allah ne kõ kuwa akwai wata hauka a gare shi?" Ã'a, waɗanda ba su yi ĩmãni da Lãhira ba, sunã a cikin azãba da ɓãta mai nĩsa.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ مَا بَيْنَ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَمَا خَلْفَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ إِن نَّشَأْ نَخْسِفْ بِهِمُ ٱلْأَرْضَ أَوْ نُسْقِطْ عَلَيْهِمْ كِسَفًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّكُلِّ عَبْدٍ مُّنِيبٍ
verses.english: Then, do they not look at what is before them and what is behind them of the heaven and earth? If We should will, We could cause the earth to swallow them or [could] let fall upon them fragments from the sky. Indeed in that is a sign for every servant turning back [to Allah].
verses.hausa: Ashe fa, ba su yi dũbi ba zuwa ga abin da ke a gaba gare su da abin da ke a bãyansu daga sama da ƙasã? idan Mun so, sai Mu shãfe ƙasã da su, kõ kuma Mu kãyar da wani ɓaɓɓake daga sama a kansu. Lalle, a cikin wancan akwai ãyã ga dukan bãwã mai maida al'amarinsa ga Allah.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَا دَاوُۥدَ مِنَّا فَضْلًا ۖ يَـٰجِبَالُ أَوِّبِى مَعَهُۥ وَٱلطَّيْرَ ۖ وَأَلَنَّا لَهُ ٱلْحَدِيدَ
verses.english: And We certainly gave David from Us bounty. [We said], "O mountains, repeat [Our] praises with him, and the birds [as well]." And We made pliable for him iron,
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa, Mun bai wa Dãwũda wata falala dagagare Mu. Yã duwatsu, ku konkõma sautin tasbihi tãre da shi kuma da tsuntsãye. Kuma Muka tausasa masa baƙin ƙarfe.

verses.arabic: أَنِ ٱعْمَلْ سَـٰبِغَـٰتٍ وَقَدِّرْ فِى ٱلسَّرْدِ ۖ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَـٰلِحًا ۖ إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ بَصِيرٌ
verses.english: [Commanding him], "Make full coats of mail and calculate [precisely] the links, and work [all of you] righteousness. Indeed I, of what you do, am Seeing."
verses.hausa: Ka aikata sulkuna kuma ka ƙaddara lissãfi ga tsãrawa, kuma ka aikata aikin ƙwarai. Lalle NĩMai gani ne ga abin da kuke aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَلِسُلَيْمَـٰنَ ٱلرِّيحَ غُدُوُّهَا شَهْرٌ وَرَوَاحُهَا شَهْرٌ ۖ وَأَسَلْنَا لَهُۥ عَيْنَ ٱلْقِطْرِ ۖ وَمِنَ ٱلْجِنِّ مَن يَعْمَلُ بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِۦ ۖ وَمَن يَزِغْ مِنْهُمْ عَنْ أَمْرِنَا نُذِقْهُ مِنْ عَذَابِ ٱلسَّعِيرِ
verses.english: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind - its morning [journey was that of] a month - and its afternoon [journey was that of] a month, and We made flow for him a spring of [liquid] copper. And among the jinn were those who worked for him by the permission of his Lord. And whoever deviated among them from Our command - We will make him taste of the punishment of the Blaze.
verses.hausa: Kuma ga Sulaimãn, Mun hõre masa iska, tafiyarta ta safiya daidai da wata, kuma ta maraice daidai da wata. Kuma Muka gudãnar masa da marmaron gaci, kuma daga aljannu (Muka hõre masa) waɗanda ke aiki a gaba gare shi, da iznin Ubangijinsa. Wanda ya karkata daga cikinsu, daga umurninMu, sai Mu ɗanɗana masa daga azãbar sa'ĩr.

verses.arabic: يَعْمَلُونَ لَهُۥ مَا يَشَآءُ مِن مَّحَـٰرِيبَ وَتَمَـٰثِيلَ وَجِفَانٍ كَٱلْجَوَابِ وَقُدُورٍ رَّاسِيَـٰتٍ ۚ ٱعْمَلُوٓا۟ ءَالَ دَاوُۥدَ شُكْرًا ۚ وَقَلِيلٌ مِّنْ عِبَادِىَ ٱلشَّكُورُ
verses.english: They made for him what he willed of elevated chambers, statues, bowls like reservoirs, and stationary kettles. [We said], "Work, O family of David, in gratitude." And few of My servants are grateful.
verses.hausa: Sunã aikata masa abin da yake so, na masallatai da mutummutumai da akussa kamar kududdufai, da tukwãne kafaffu. Ku aikata gõdiya, yã ɗiyan Dãwũda, kuma kaɗan ne mai gõdiya daga bãyĩNa.

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا قَضَيْنَا عَلَيْهِ ٱلْمَوْتَ مَا دَلَّهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَوْتِهِۦٓ إِلَّا دَآبَّةُ ٱلْأَرْضِ تَأْكُلُ مِنسَأَتَهُۥ ۖ فَلَمَّا خَرَّ تَبَيَّنَتِ ٱلْجِنُّ أَن لَّوْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْلَمُونَ ٱلْغَيْبَ مَا لَبِثُوا۟ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ ٱلْمُهِينِ
verses.english: And when We decreed for Solomon death, nothing indicated to the jinn his death except a creature of the earth eating his staff. But when he fell, it became clear to the jinn that if they had known the unseen, they would not have remained in humiliating punishment.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan a lõkacin da Muka hukunta mutuwa a kansa bãbu abin da ya ja hankalinsu, a kan mutuwarsa, fãce dabbar ƙasa (gara) wadda take cin sandarsa. To a lõkacin da ya fãɗi, sai aljannu suka bayyana (ga mutãne) cẽwa dã sun kasance sun san gaibi, dã ba su zauna ba a cikin azãba mai wulãkantarwa.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ كَانَ لِسَبَإٍ فِى مَسْكَنِهِمْ ءَايَةٌ ۖ جَنَّتَانِ عَن يَمِينٍ وَشِمَالٍ ۖ كُلُوا۟ مِن رِّزْقِ رَبِّكُمْ وَٱشْكُرُوا۟ لَهُۥ ۚ بَلْدَةٌ طَيِّبَةٌ وَرَبٌّ غَفُورٌ
verses.english: There was for [the tribe of] Saba' in their dwelling place a sign: two [fields of] gardens on the right and on the left. [They were told], "Eat from the provisions of your Lord and be grateful to Him. A good land [have you], and a forgiving Lord."
verses.hausa: Lalle, haƙĩƙa, akwai ãyã ga saba'ãwa a cikin mazauninsu: gõnakin lambu biyu, dama da hagu. "Ku ci daga arzikin Ubangijinku, kuma ku yi gõdiya gare shi. Gari mai dãɗin zama, da Ubangiji Mai gãfara."

verses.arabic: فَأَعْرَضُوا۟ فَأَرْسَلْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ سَيْلَ ٱلْعَرِمِ وَبَدَّلْنَـٰهُم بِجَنَّتَيْهِمْ جَنَّتَيْنِ ذَوَاتَىْ أُكُلٍ خَمْطٍ وَأَثْلٍ وَشَىْءٍ مِّن سِدْرٍ قَلِيلٍ
verses.english: But they turned away [refusing], so We sent upon them the flood of the dam, and We replaced their two [fields of] gardens with gardens of bitter fruit, tamarisks and something of sparse lote trees.
verses.hausa: Sai suka bijire sabõda haka Muka saki Mãlãlin Arimi (dam) a kansu, kuma Muka musanya musu gõnakinsu biyu da waɗansu gõnaki biyu mãsu 'ya'yan itãce kaɗan: talãkiya da gõriba da wani abu na magarya kaɗan.

verses.arabic: ذَٰلِكَ جَزَيْنَـٰهُم بِمَا كَفَرُوا۟ ۖ وَهَلْ نُجَـٰزِىٓ إِلَّا ٱلْكَفُورَ
verses.english: [By] that We repaid them because they disbelieved. And do We [thus] repay except the ungrateful?
verses.hausa: Wancan, da shi Muka yi musu sakamako sabõda kãfircinsu. Kuma lalle, bã Mu yi wa kõwa irin wannan sakamako, fãce kafirai.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ ٱلْقُرَى ٱلَّتِى بَـٰرَكْنَا فِيهَا قُرًى ظَـٰهِرَةً وَقَدَّرْنَا فِيهَا ٱلسَّيْرَ ۖ سِيرُوا۟ فِيهَا لَيَالِىَ وَأَيَّامًا ءَامِنِينَ
verses.english: And We placed between them and the cities which We had blessed [many] visible cities. And We determined between them the [distances of] journey, [saying], "Travel between them by night or day in safety."
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka sanya, a tsakaninsu da tsakãnin garũruwan da Muka Sanya albarka a cikinsu, waɗansu garũruwa mãsuganin jũna kuma Muka ƙaddara tafiya a cikinsu, "Ku yi tafiya a cikinsu, darũruwa da rãnaiku, kunã amintattu."

verses.arabic: فَقَالُوا۟ رَبَّنَا بَـٰعِدْ بَيْنَ أَسْفَارِنَا وَظَلَمُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ فَجَعَلْنَـٰهُمْ أَحَادِيثَ وَمَزَّقْنَـٰهُمْ كُلَّ مُمَزَّقٍ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٍ شَكُورٍ
verses.english: But [insolently] they said, "Our Lord, lengthen the distance between our journeys," and wronged themselves, so We made them narrations and dispersed them in total dispersion. Indeed in that are signs for everyone patient and grateful.
verses.hausa: Sai suka ce: "Ya Ubangijinmu! Ka nĩsantar da tsakãnin tafiyõyinmu," kuma suka zãlunci kansu, sabõda haka Muka sanya su lãbãran hĩra kuma Muka kekkẽce su kõwace, irin kekkẽcewa. Lalle a cikin wancan akwai ãyõyi ga dukan mai yawan haƙuri, mai yawan gõdiya.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ صَدَّقَ عَلَيْهِمْ إِبْلِيسُ ظَنَّهُۥ فَٱتَّبَعُوهُ إِلَّا فَرِيقًا مِّنَ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And Iblees had already confirmed through them his assumption, so they followed him, except for a party of believers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle, haƙĩƙa, Iblĩs ya gaskata zatonsa a kansu, sai suka bi shi fãce wani ɓangare na mũminai.

verses.arabic: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُۥ عَلَيْهِم مِّن سُلْطَـٰنٍ إِلَّا لِنَعْلَمَ مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ مِمَّنْ هُوَ مِنْهَا فِى شَكٍّ ۗ وَرَبُّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ حَفِيظٌ
verses.english: And he had over them no authority except [it was decreed] that We might make evident who believes in the Hereafter from who is thereof in doubt. And your Lord, over all things, is Guardian.
verses.hausa: Kuma bã ya da wani dalĩli a kansu fãce dai dõmin Mu san wanda yake yin ĩmãni da Lãhira daga wanda yake a cikin shakka daga gare ta. Kuma Ubangijinka, a kan kõme, Mai tsaro ne.

verses.arabic: قُلِ ٱدْعُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمْتُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَلَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا لَهُمْ فِيهِمَا مِن شِرْكٍ وَمَا لَهُۥ مِنْهُم مِّن ظَهِيرٍ
verses.english: Say, [O Muhammad], "Invoke those you claim [as deities] besides Allah." They do not possess an atom's weight [of ability] in the heavens or on the earth, and they do not have therein any partnership [with Him], nor is there for Him from among them any assistant.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ku kirãyi waɗanda kuka riya (cẽwa abũbuwan bautãwa ne) baicin Allah, bã su Mallakar ma'aunin zarra a cikin sammai, kuma bã su Mallakarsa a cikin ƙasa kuma bã su da wani rabon tãrẽwa a cikinsu (sammai da ƙasa), kuma bã Shi da wani mataimaki daga gare su.

verses.arabic: وَلَا تَنفَعُ ٱلشَّفَـٰعَةُ عِندَهُۥٓ إِلَّا لِمَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُۥ ۚ حَتَّىٰٓ إِذَا فُزِّعَ عَن قُلُوبِهِمْ قَالُوا۟ مَاذَا قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ ۖ قَالُوا۟ ٱلْحَقَّ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
verses.english: And intercession does not benefit with Him except for one whom He permits. [And those wait] until, when terror is removed from their hearts, they will say [to one another], "What has your Lord said?" They will say, "The truth." And He is the Most High, the Grand.
verses.hausa: "Kuma wani cẽto bã ya amfãni a wurinSa face fa ga wanda Ya yi izni a gare shi. Har a lõkacin da aka kuranye tsõro daga zukãtansu, sai su ce, 'Mẽne ne Ubangijinku Ya ce?' Suka ce: 'Gaskiya', kuma shi ne Maɗaukaki, Mai girma,"

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ قُلِ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَإِنَّآ أَوْ إِيَّاكُمْ لَعَلَىٰ هُدًى أَوْ فِى ضَلَـٰلٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: Say, "Who provides for you from the heavens and the earth?" Say, "Allah. And indeed, we or you are either upon guidance or in clear error."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Wãne ne yake azurta ku daga sama da ƙasa?" Ka ce: "Allah kuma lalle mũ kõ ku, wani yanã a kan shiriya, kõ yana a cikin ɓata bayyananniya."

verses.arabic: قُل لَّا تُسْـَٔلُونَ عَمَّآ أَجْرَمْنَا وَلَا نُسْـَٔلُ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: Say, "You will not be asked about what we committed, and we will not be asked about what you do."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Bã zã a tambaye ku ba ga abin da muka aikata daga laifi, kuma bã zã a tambaye mu daga abin da kuke aikatawa ba."

verses.arabic: قُلْ يَجْمَعُ بَيْنَنَا رَبُّنَا ثُمَّ يَفْتَحُ بَيْنَنَا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَهُوَ ٱلْفَتَّاحُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: Say, "Our Lord will bring us together; then He will judge between us in truth. And He is the Knowing Judge."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ubangijinmu zai tãra tsakãninmu, sa'an nan Ya yi hukunci a tsakaninmu da gaskiya. Kuma Shĩ ne Mahukunci, Masani."

verses.arabic: قُلْ أَرُونِىَ ٱلَّذِينَ أَلْحَقْتُم بِهِۦ شُرَكَآءَ ۖ كَلَّا ۚ بَلْ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
verses.english: Say, "Show me those whom you have attached to Him as partners. No! Rather, He [alone] is Allah, the Exalted in Might, the Wise."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ku nũna mini waɗanda kuka riskar da Shi, su zama abõkan tãrayya. Ã'a, Shĩ ne Allah, Mabuwãyi, Mai hikima."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ إِلَّا كَآفَّةً لِّلنَّاسِ بَشِيرًا وَنَذِيرًا وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: And We have not sent you except comprehensively to mankind as a bringer of good tidings and a warner. But most of the people do not know.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu aika ka ba fãce zuwa ga mutãne gabã ɗaya, kanã mai bãyar da bushãra kuma mai gargaɗi, kuma amma mafi yawan mutãne ba su sani ba.

verses.arabic: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا ٱلْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
verses.hausa: Sunã cẽwa, "Yaushe ne wannan wa'adi zai auku idan kun kasance mãsu gaskiya?"

verses.arabic: قُل لَّكُم مِّيعَادُ يَوْمٍ لَّا تَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ عَنْهُ سَاعَةً وَلَا تَسْتَقْدِمُونَ
verses.english: Say, "For you is the appointment of a Day [when] you will not remain thereafter an hour, nor will you precede [it]."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Kunã da mi'ãdin wani yini wanda bã ku jinkirta daga gare shi kõ da sa'a ɗaya, kuma bã ku gabãta."

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَن نُّؤْمِنَ بِهَـٰذَا ٱلْقُرْءَانِ وَلَا بِٱلَّذِى بَيْنَ يَدَيْهِ ۗ وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ مَوْقُوفُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ يَرْجِعُ بَعْضُهُمْ إِلَىٰ بَعْضٍ ٱلْقَوْلَ يَقُولُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ لَوْلَآ أَنتُمْ لَكُنَّا مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: And those who disbelieve say, "We will never believe in this Qur'an nor in that before it." But if you could see when the wrongdoers are made to stand before their Lord, refuting each other's words... Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "If not for you, we would have been believers."
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce: "Bã zã mu yi ĩmanida wannan Alƙur'ãni ba, kuma bã zã mu yi ĩmani da abin da yakea gabãninsa ba (na waɗansu littattafan sama)." Kuma dã kã gani a lõkacin da azzãlumai suke abin tsayarwa wurin Ubangijinka, sashensu na mayar wa sãshe maganar maraunana (mabiya) suke cẽwa makangara (shũgabanni) "Ba dõminku ba, lalle, dã mun kasance mũminai."

verses.arabic: قَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوٓا۟ أَنَحْنُ صَدَدْنَـٰكُمْ عَنِ ٱلْهُدَىٰ بَعْدَ إِذْ جَآءَكُم ۖ بَلْ كُنتُم مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.english: Those who were arrogant will say to those who were oppressed, "Did we avert you from guidance after it had come to you? Rather, you were criminals."
verses.hausa: Makangara suka ce wa maraunana, "Ashe, mũ ne muka kange ku daga shiriya a bãyan ya zo muku? Ã, a' kun dai kasance mãsu laifi."

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتُضْعِفُوا۟ لِلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَكْبَرُوا۟ بَلْ مَكْرُ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ إِذْ تَأْمُرُونَنَآ أَن نَّكْفُرَ بِٱللَّهِ وَنَجْعَلَ لَهُۥٓ أَندَادًا ۚ وَأَسَرُّوا۟ ٱلنَّدَامَةَ لَمَّا رَأَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ وَجَعَلْنَا ٱلْأَغْلَـٰلَ فِىٓ أَعْنَاقِ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ ۚ هَلْ يُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: Those who were oppressed will say to those who were arrogant, "Rather, [it was your] conspiracy of night and day when you were ordering us to disbelieve in Allah and attribute to Him equals." But they will [all] confide regret when they see the punishment; and We will put shackles on the necks of those who disbelieved. Will they be recompensed except for what they used to do?
verses.hausa: Kuma maraunana suka ce wa makangara. "Ã'a, (ku tuna) mãkircin dare da na rãna a lõkacin da kuke umurnin mu da mu kãfirta da Allah, kuma mu sanya Masa abõkan tãrayya." Kuma suka assirtar da nadãma a lõkacin da suka ga azãba. Kuma Muka sanya ƙuƙumma a cikin wuyõyin waɗanda suka kãfirta. Lalle, bã zã a yi musu sakamako ba fãce da abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَا فِى قَرْيَةٍ مِّن نَّذِيرٍ إِلَّا قَالَ مُتْرَفُوهَآ إِنَّا بِمَآ أُرْسِلْتُم بِهِۦ كَـٰفِرُونَ
verses.english: And We did not send into a city any warner except that its affluent said, "Indeed we, in that with which you were sent, are disbelievers."
verses.hausa: Kuma ba mu aika wani mai gargaɗi ba a cikin wata alƙarya fãce mani'imtanta (shũgabanni) sunce, "Lalle mũ, mãsu kãfirta ne da abin da aka aiko ku da shi."

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ نَحْنُ أَكْثَرُ أَمْوَٰلًا وَأَوْلَـٰدًا وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.english: And they said, "We are more [than the believers] in wealth and children, and we are not to be punished."
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Mũ ne mafiya yawa ga dũkiya da ɗiya, kuma mu ba mu zama waɗanda ake yi wa azãba ba."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّى يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills and restricts [it], but most of the people do not know."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Lalle, Ubangijĩna Yanã shimfiɗa arziki ga wanda Ya so, kuma Yanã ƙuntatãwa, kuma amma mafi yawan mutãne ba su sani ba."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَمْوَٰلُكُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُكُم بِٱلَّتِى تُقَرِّبُكُمْ عِندَنَا زُلْفَىٰٓ إِلَّا مَنْ ءَامَنَ وَعَمِلَ صَـٰلِحًا فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ جَزَآءُ ٱلضِّعْفِ بِمَا عَمِلُوا۟ وَهُمْ فِى ٱلْغُرُفَـٰتِ ءَامِنُونَ
verses.english: And it is not your wealth or your children that bring you nearer to Us in position, but it is [by being] one who has believed and done righteousness. For them there will be the double reward for what they did, and they will be in the upper chambers [of Paradise], safe [and secure].
verses.hausa: Kuma dũkiyarku ba ta zamo ba, haka ɗiyanku ba su zamo abin da yake kusantar da ku ba a wurinMu, kusantarwar muƙãmi fãce wanda, ya yi ĩmãni kuma ya aikata aikin ƙwarai. To, waɗannan sunã da sakamakon ninkawa sabõda abin da suka aikata. Kuma su amintattu ne a cikin bẽnãye.

verses.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَسْعَوْنَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مُعَـٰجِزِينَ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ فِى ٱلْعَذَابِ مُحْضَرُونَ
verses.english: And the ones who strive against Our verses to cause [them] failure - those will be brought into the punishment [to remain].
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke mãkirci a cikin ãyõyinMu, sunã nẽman gajiyarwa, waɗannan abin halartãwa ne a cikin azãba.

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّى يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَقْدِرُ لَهُۥ ۚ وَمَآ أَنفَقْتُم مِّن شَىْءٍ فَهُوَ يُخْلِفُهُۥ ۖ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلرَّٰزِقِينَ
verses.english: Say, "Indeed, my Lord extends provision for whom He wills of His servants and restricts [it] for him. But whatever thing you spend [in His cause] - He will compensate it; and He is the best of providers."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Lalle, Ubangijĩna Yanã shimfida arziki ga wanda Ya so daga bãyinSa, kuma Yanã ƙuntatãwa a gare shi, kuma abin da kuka ciyar daga wani abu, to, Shĩ ne zai musanya shi, kuma Shĩ ne Mafi fĩcin mãsu azurtawa."

verses.arabic: وَيَوْمَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ جَمِيعًا ثُمَّ يَقُولُ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ أَهَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ إِيَّاكُمْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ
verses.english: And [mention] the Day when He will gather them all and then say to the angels, "Did these [people] used to worship you?"
verses.hausa: Kuma rãnar da Allah Ya ke tãra su gabã ɗaya, sa'an nan Ya ce wa Malã'iku, "Shin, waɗannan kũ ne suka kasance sunã bauta wa?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ سُبْحَـٰنَكَ أَنتَ وَلِيُّنَا مِن دُونِهِم ۖ بَلْ كَانُوا۟ يَعْبُدُونَ ٱلْجِنَّ ۖ أَكْثَرُهُم بِهِم مُّؤْمِنُونَ
verses.english: They will say, "Exalted are You! You, [O Allah], are our benefactor not them. Rather, they used to worship the jinn; most of them were believers in them."
verses.hausa: Sukace: "Tsarki ya tabbata a gare Ka. Kai ne Majiɓincinmu, bã su ba. Ã'a, sun kasance sunã bauta wa aljannu. Mafi yawansu, da sũ suka yi ĩmani."

verses.arabic: فَٱلْيَوْمَ لَا يَمْلِكُ بَعْضُكُمْ لِبَعْضٍ نَّفْعًا وَلَا ضَرًّا وَنَقُولُ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا۟ ذُوقُوا۟ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ ٱلَّتِى كُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.english: But today you do not hold for one another [the power of] benefit or harm, and We will say to those who wronged, "Taste the punishment of the Fire, which you used to deny."
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka, a yau sãshenku bã ya mallakar wani amfãni ga wani sãshen, kuma bã ya mallakar wata cũta, kuma Munã cẽwa ga waɗanda suka yi zalunci, Ku ɗanɗani azabar wutã wadda "kuka kasance game da ita, kunã ƙaryatãwa."

verses.arabic: وَإِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَايَـٰتُنَا بَيِّنَـٰتٍ قَالُوا۟ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا رَجُلٌ يُرِيدُ أَن يَصُدَّكُمْ عَمَّا كَانَ يَعْبُدُ ءَابَآؤُكُمْ وَقَالُوا۟ مَا هَـٰذَآ إِلَّآ إِفْكٌ مُّفْتَرًى ۚ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لِلْحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَهُمْ إِنْ هَـٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: And when our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, they say, "This is not but a man who wishes to avert you from that which your fathers were worshipping." And they say, "This is not except a lie invented." And those who disbelieve say of the truth when it has come to them, "This is not but obvious magic."
verses.hausa: Kuma idan an karanta ãyõyinMu bayyanannu a kansu, sai su ce: "Wannan bai zama ba fãce namiji ne yanã son ya kange ku daga abin da ubanninku suka kasance sunã bauta wa." Kuma su ce: "Wannan bai zama ba fãce ƙiren ƙarya da aka ƙãga." Kuma waɗanda suka kãfirta suka ce: ga gaskiya a lõkacin da ta je musu: "Wannan bã kõme ba fãce sihiri ne bayyananne."

verses.arabic: وَمَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُم مِّن كُتُبٍ يَدْرُسُونَهَا ۖ وَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَآ إِلَيْهِمْ قَبْلَكَ مِن نَّذِيرٍ
verses.english: And We had not given them any scriptures which they could study, and We had not sent to them before you, [O Muhammad], any warner.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu bã su waɗansu littattafai ba waɗanda suke karãtun su, kuma ba Mu aika wani mai gargaɗi ba zuwa gare su a gabãninka!

verses.arabic: وَكَذَّبَ ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ وَمَا بَلَغُوا۟ مِعْشَارَ مَآ ءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ فَكَذَّبُوا۟ رُسُلِى ۖ فَكَيْفَ كَانَ نَكِيرِ
verses.english: And those before them denied, and the people of Makkah have not attained a tenth of what We had given them. But the former peoples denied My messengers, so how [terrible] was My reproach.
verses.hausa: Kuma waɗanda suke a gabãninsu, sun ƙaryata, alhãli kuwa ba su kai ushurin-ushurin abin da Muka bã su ba, sai suka ƙaryata ManzanniNa! To, yãya musũNa (ga maƙaryata) ya kasance?

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّمَآ أَعِظُكُم بِوَٰحِدَةٍ ۖ أَن تَقُومُوا۟ لِلَّهِ مَثْنَىٰ وَفُرَٰدَىٰ ثُمَّ تَتَفَكَّرُوا۟ ۚ مَا بِصَاحِبِكُم مِّن جِنَّةٍ ۚ إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ لَّكُم بَيْنَ يَدَىْ عَذَابٍ شَدِيدٍ
verses.english: Say, "I only advise you of one [thing] - that you stand for Allah, [seeking truth] in pairs and individually, and then give thought." There is not in your companion any madness. He is only a warner to you before a severe punishment.
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Ina yi muku wa'azi ne kawai da kalma guda! watau ku tsayu dõmin Allah, bibbiyu da ɗaiɗai, sa'an nan ku yi tunãni, bãbu wata hauka ga ma'abũcinku. Shĩ bai zama ba fãce mai gargaɗi ne a gare ku a gaba ga wata azãba mai tsanani.

verses.arabic: قُلْ مَا سَأَلْتُكُم مِّنْ أَجْرٍ فَهُوَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِىَ إِلَّا عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.english: Say, "Whatever payment I might have asked of you - it is yours. My payment is only from Allah, and He is, over all things, Witness."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Abin da na rõƙe ku na wani sakamako, to, amfãninsa nãku ne. Ijãrata ba ta zama ba fãce daga Allah, kuma shi Mahalarci ne a kan dukan kõme."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِنَّ رَبِّى يَقْذِفُ بِٱلْحَقِّ عَلَّـٰمُ ٱلْغُيُوبِ
verses.english: Say, "Indeed, my Lord projects the truth. Knower of the unseen."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Lalle Ubangijina Yanã jẽfa gaskiya. (Shi) Masanin abũbuwan fake ne."

verses.arabic: قُلْ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَمَا يُبْدِئُ ٱلْبَـٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ
verses.english: Say, "The truth has come, and falsehood can neither begin [anything] nor repeat [it]."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Gaskiya ta zo, kuma ƙarya bã ta iya fara (kome) kuma bã ta iya mayarwa."

verses.arabic: قُلْ إِن ضَلَلْتُ فَإِنَّمَآ أَضِلُّ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِى ۖ وَإِنِ ٱهْتَدَيْتُ فَبِمَا يُوحِىٓ إِلَىَّ رَبِّىٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ سَمِيعٌ قَرِيبٌ
verses.english: Say, "If I should err, I would only err against myself. But if I am guided, it is by what my Lord reveals to me. Indeed, He is Hearing and near."
verses.hausa: Ka ce: "Idan na ɓace, to, inã ɓacẽwa ne kawai a kan kaina. Kuma idan na shiryu, to, sabõda abin da Ubangijina Yake yõwar wahayi ne zuwa a gare ni. Lalle Shĩ Mai ji ne, Makusanci."

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ تَرَىٰٓ إِذْ فَزِعُوا۟ فَلَا فَوْتَ وَأُخِذُوا۟ مِن مَّكَانٍ قَرِيبٍ
verses.english: And if you could see when they are terrified but there is no escape, and they will be seized from a place nearby.
verses.hausa: Kuma dã kã gani, a lõkacin da suka firgita, to, bãbu kuɓuta, kuma aka kãma su daga wuri makusanci.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُمُ ٱلتَّنَاوُشُ مِن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
verses.english: And they will [then] say, "We believe in it!" But how for them will be the taking [of faith] from a place far away?
verses.hausa: Kuma suka ce: "Mun yi ĩmãni da Shi." To inã zã su sãmu kãmãwa daga wuri mai nisa?

verses.arabic: وَقَدْ كَفَرُوا۟ بِهِۦ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ وَيَقْذِفُونَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ مِن مَّكَانٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
verses.english: And they had already disbelieved in it before and would assault the unseen from a place far away.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle sun kãfirta da Shi a gabãnin haka, kuma sunã jĩfa da jãhilci daga wuri mai nĩsa.

verses.arabic: وَحِيلَ بَيْنَهُمْ وَبَيْنَ مَا يَشْتَهُونَ كَمَا فُعِلَ بِأَشْيَاعِهِم مِّن قَبْلُ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا۟ فِى شَكٍّ مُّرِيبٍۭ
verses.english: And prevention will be placed between them and what they desire, as was done with their kind before. Indeed, they were in disquieting denial.
verses.hausa: Kuma an shãmakance a tsakãninsu da tsakãnin abin da suke marmari, kamar yadda aka aikata da irin ƙungiyõyinsu a gabãninsu. Lalle sũ sun kasance a cikin shakka mai sanya kõkanto.
